title: Hanes Men's X-Temp Performance T-Shirt Pack, Cotton Blend Moisture-Wicking Tees for Men, 2-Pack
description: A STOCK-UP VALUE PACK - Grab a handy pack of two for one-and-done shopping.
COOL COMFORT - X-Temp technology is designed to help keep you cool and dry, wicking moisture away from skin.
HOLDS ITS SHAPE - The crewneck collar lays flat and holds its shape.
HANES QUALITY - Men's tees feature double-needle stitching and shoulder-to-shoulder taping.
SO SOFT - A ring-spun cotton-rich blend of cotton/polyester feels as good as it looks.
EASY MACHINE CARE- Throw your men's tee shirts in the machine in cold water on laundry day, tumble dry low.

When it comes to the performance you want in a simple men’s tee, you can't do better than Hanes® X-Temp® crewneck t-shirts. Crafted from a cotton-rich blended fabric, these men’s t-shirts feature innovative X-Temp™ technology that's designed to keep you cool and dry while wicking moisture away from your skin. Boasting the softness of ring-spun cotton, these men’s crewneck tees feature double-needle stitching, a lay-flat ribbed crewneck, and robust shoulder-to-shoulder taping. Available in a convenient two-pack, you’ll learn to love the cool, classic comfort of these moisture-wicking t-shirts for men.
